QuestData.Title: Lieutenant Paval Reethe
QuestData.Description: A glint of light on the ground catches your eye from underneath the rubble. Brushing debris and ash caked onto the object reveals the insignia of a gold anchor on white, enameled on the surface: the sign of Theramore.$b$bUnderneath the anchor is embossed the name "Lieutenant Paval Reethe".
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Reethe's Badge to Krog in Brackenwall Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you found any leads on what happened at the Shady Rest Inn?
